statements: SELECT * FROM WaterLevels WHERE water_level > 100 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT reservoir_name, river_name, water_level FROM WaterLevels WHERE reservoir_id = 1
SELECT * FROM WaterLevels WHERE river_id = 2 ORDER BY water_level DESC, measurement_date ASC
SELECT reservoir_name, water_level FROM WaterLevels WHERE measurement_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT reservoir_name, river_name, measurement_date FROM WaterLevels WHERE water_level < 50 ORDER BY river_name ASC
SELECT * FROM WaterLevels WHERE reservoir_id = 1 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT reservoir_id, reservoir_name, water_level FROM WaterLevels WHERE river_id = 2 AND water_level >= 50 ORDER BY water_level DESC;
SELECT reservoir_name, river_name, measurement_date FROM WaterLevels WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY reservoir_name, river_name;
SELECT river_id, AVG(water_level) AS avg_water_level FROM WaterLevels GROUP BY river_id HAVING AVG(water_level) > 75;
SELECT * FROM WaterLevels WHERE reservoir_name LIKE 'Lake%' OR river_name LIKE 'River%' ORDER BY reservoir_name, river_name, measurement_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Reservoirs;
SELECT id, name, capacity FROM Reservoirs ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT name, current_level FROM Reservoirs WHERE current_level > 80;
SELECT id, name, length FROM Rivers ORDER BY length ASC;
SELECT * FROM Rivers WHERE flow_rate BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM Reservoirs WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY current_level DESC;
SELECT name, current_level FROM Reservoirs WHERE last_update > '2021-01-01' AND capacity BETWEEN 500 AND 1500 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT name, capacity, current_level, last_update FROM Reservoirs WHERE current_level < 500 OR capacity > 2000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Rivers WHERE length > 200 ORDER BY flow_rate DESC, water_level ASC;
SELECT name, flow_rate, water_level FROM Rivers WHERE last_update < '2020-06-01' ORDER BY length DESC;
SELECT * FROM Reservoirs WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, name FROM Rivers WHERE length < 500 ORDER BY id
SELECT name, water_level FROM Reservoirs WHERE water_level >= 50
SELECT * FROM DroughtPredictions WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-08-01' ORDER BY severity_level ASC
SELECT region, MAX(severity_level) FROM DroughtPredictions GROUP BY region
SELECT * FROM Reservoirs WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY water_level DESC;
SELECT name, capacity FROM Reservoirs WHERE water_level < 50;
SELECT region, prediction_date FROM DroughtPredictions WHERE severity_level >= 3 ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Rivers WHERE length > 500 ORDER BY water_flow_rate DESC;
SELECT name, water_level FROM Reservoirs WHERE capacity < 500 AND water_level > 20;
SELECT * FROM Reservoir;
SELECT name, water_level FROM Reservoir WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT id, length FROM River ORDER BY length DESC;
SELECT location, installation_date FROM WaterSensor WHERE type = 'Moisture';
SELECT * FROM DroughtPrediction WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT name, capacity, water_level FROM Reservoir WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, location, type FROM WaterSensor WHERE installation_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY type DESC
SELECT * FROM River WHERE flow_rate < 50 ORDER BY length DESC
SELECT id, location, prediction_date FROM DroughtPrediction WHERE severity = 'Severe' ORDER BY prediction_date ASC
SELECT name, length, flow_rate FROM River WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY length ASC
SELECT * FROM Reservoirs;
SELECT reservoir_name, current_level FROM Reservoirs ORDER BY current_level DESC;
SELECT river_name, length FROM Rivers;
SELECT point_name, location FROM MeasurementPoints WHERE type = 'water_sensor';
SELECT * FROM DroughtPredictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Reservoirs;
SELECT reservoir_name, capacity FROM Reservoirs ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT river_name, length FROM Rivers WHERE length > 100 ORDER BY river_name ASC;
SELECT measurement_date, water_level FROM Measurements WHERE water_level < 50 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT prediction_result, prediction_date FROM DroughtPredictions ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
